sentences.sContent: Buy cheese and meat from your local delicatessen and have it wrapped in paper.
sentences.sContent_eng: Buy cheese and meat from your local delicatessen and have it wrapped in paper.
sentences.sCn: 从当地的熟食店购买奶酪和肉食，并用纸包裹。

words.tran: 熟食店；[食品] 熟食品（等于delicatessen）

trans.tranOther: a shop that sells high quality cheeses,  salad s  ,cooked meats etc
